markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Call Bonded Item](/Feats.aspx?ID=1836) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 142 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[arcane bond](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

You're mystically connected to your bonded item and can call it to your hand. If your bonded item is 1 Bulk or less, you teleport your bonded item into your hand from up to 1 mile away.
name: Call Bonded Item
